title: Can't see support ticket
body: Hello, my smurf account was recently hacked and I'm trying to review the ticket to post additional information however, when I try to do so I get an error message saying "OOPS the page youre looking for doesn't exist". Any help would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body: also the smurf account is on right now. I can see it through my main account. is there a way to disable it temporarily so none of my friends are scammed?

You'll need to be logged into the ticketing center to view your ticket.  I do see that it's currently open and received your response yesterday.  If you run into any trouble seeing your ticket, an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) or email to support@riotgames.com can get you to the right places while still give you a venue we can reply back.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I am logged in however I filed the recovery through email. the link above was sent via email response. is there anything else I can do to add info to the ticket? I don't want to keep adding to the ticket each time I get a response because response time is already high. Thanks in advance!
